926980.name: Fantasy Grounds - Quests of Doom 4: God of Ore (5E)
926980.description:
Quests of Doom 4: God of Ore

by
Tom Knauss
God of Ore is an adventure for 3rd-level characters that takes them from the quiet, mountainside town of Miners' Refuge into the heart of the Stoneheart Mountains in pursuit of a failed pilgrimage to discover a phony religious relic deep inside legendary Mithral Mountain.
The dark, twisting tunnels that bore into the fabled mountain soon reveal that some mysteries are not what they first appear to be.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Charles Surette
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
